Articles.Content:
Errr, forgive my ignorance...but can you delete a thread or only posts within the thread? I was trying to put the KSP ribbons in my signature and am apparently a forum noob! Any help would be great, and I will delete this once I learn how. Thanks!

Edited January 20, 2015 by Steelsunoa

I'm afraid not, you can only delete replies if you are the OP of the thread. You can, however, commission a moderator to lock the thread so no further posting will occur.

Other than that, welcome aboard!

Well that's certainly good to know for the future, thanks. So if I wanted to delete/lock this thread, how would I go about requesting that from a moderator?

Edited January 20, 2015 by Steelsunoa
You could PM one of us moderatey types, or post in this thread. But I'm afraid I'm not clear what you want. What needs deleting?
